description:
The Wimbledon Championships, commonly known as 'The Championships' or simply 'Wimbledon', is the oldest tennis tournament in the world and is widely regarded as the most prestigious. It has been held at the All England Club in Wimbledon, London since 1877 and is played on outdoor grass courts. There have been retractable roofs over the two main courts since 2019. The 135th edition is scheduled to take place between June 27, and July 10, 2022. 

This is a market about the winner of the Men’s Singles category of the 2022 Wimbledon Championships, in which Novak Djokovic is the three-time defending champion.

The market will resolve to “Yes” if Novak Djokovic wins the 2022 Wimbledon Championships Men's Singles tournament. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. If the winner is not known by July 17, 2022, (12:00 PM ET), this market will resolve to 50-50.

If at any point it becomes impossible for Novak Djokovic to win in Men's Singles based on the rules of The Championships, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source will be official information from Wimbledon (https://www.wimbledon.com/), however credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: 2022 Wimbledon

groupItemTitle: Will Novak Djokovic win Men's Singles?
question: 2022 Wimbledon Championships: Will Novak Djokovic win Men's Singles?
